channel.title: Any1 know where i can get a free screenshot taker that captures movement?
channel.description: Title pretty much says its all.

item.title: Any1 know where i can get a free screenshot taker that captures movement?
item.dc:creator: @iKilem iKilem
item.description:
@iKilem wrote:

I think he’s looking for a screencasting program. CamStudio is free, but I’ve never used it. What I have used is Camtasia and ZDSoft. Both are shareware, so you can use a trial version for 30 days or whatever. Can’t remember what the drawbacks of using the trial version were, though. If what you want is to record game-footage, see FRAPS. There’s a free version. Again, can’t remember the drawbacks.

Read full topic
item.source: Any1 know where i can get a free screenshot taker that captures movement?

item.title: Any1 know where i can get a free screenshot taker that captures movement?

@Logitek wrote:

print screen key on keyboard + ctr v in paint
